籤詩版本二:
Munguva yekusanaya kwemvura, minda yese yaoma, tenda Mwari nemvura inonaka.
Maruva, michero, uye zvinomera zvose zvakanyorova, uye ndinoziva kuti mvura imwe chete inokosha zvidimbu zvine chiuru zvendarama.
詩意:
Iyi hexagram chiratidzo chekusanaya kwemvura uye mvura inotapira.
Mukuoma kwese mune ruponeso.
解曰:
Makonye ekumunda akaibva zvakapetwa kaviri. Destiny inouya zvishoma nezvishoma. Chirwere chinosangana nemushonga wakanaka. Kunetsa kwevanofamba netsoka.
(Hazvina kunaka → Sorry.)
籤詩故事一:
◇Rokuro yaponeswa
Yang Yanzhao (958-1014) aiva mwanakomana wechitanhatu waYang Ye. Zita rake chairo ainzi Yanlang, anozivikanwawo saYang Liulang. Akaberekwa mugore rechishanu raZhou Xiande (958) mushure meMadzinza mashanu. Aibva kuLinzhou (zvino Shenmu, Shaanxi).
Yang Ye akatungamirira mauto matatu uye akakomberedzwa neuto reFan Yang Ye akarovera musoro wake pachivako chaLi Ling ndokufa.
Yang Qilang akakumbira rubatsiro ndokupfurwa nemuseve kusvika afa.Liulang akadzokera kuHulu Valley. Akanunurwa nomumongi kubva kuGomo reWutai (Yang Wulang) uye akanga abuda mungozi.
(Mumongi anouya kuzonunura. Uyu ndiwo dimikira remvura inonaya panguva yakakodzera.)
聖意: Namatira imba yako nemusha kuti zvizvidzivirire, tsvaga pfuma, zvibvumirano zvakanaka, kunonoka kuroora, uye kuroora muLiujia.Vafambi vechikadzi vane zvipingamupinyi mumunda, makonye, ​​mhuka nhanhatu, uye kuwana vanhu.Zvakaoma kuwana. vanhu, mhosva, kurasikirwa, kutama, kuchengetedza, uye zvinhu zvakarasika.Madokero (chinyorwa: kuchamhembe ndekwemvura uye kumadokero ndeyegoridhe) Zvirwere zvinopihwa (zvichapora) ) Shanfen Anji
